data.prayer: Spirit, help the 104,520 believers in Kiev City to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kiev City, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Kiev City, Ukraine to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kiev City, Ukraine.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 104,520 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Kiev City.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pashtun, Southern people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kiev City, Ukraine and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Kiev City, Ukraine.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Kiev City.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.
